attributes.action:
Dissolution!
Call a General Election now!
attributes.additional_details:
We, the people, have no confidence in the way the Labour Government has acted.
Pensioners and farmers have been directly affected by policies that were not included in Labour's manifesto.
We were deliberately misled and the obfuscation and deceit has only got worse since Starmer took power.
It is time for action.

There needs to be a dissolution of Parliament and a General Election called now!
attributes.background:
On July 4 2024, Sir Keir Starmer was elected as Prime Minister.
Since then, his Labour Government has introduced measures that were not included in the Labour Party's manifesto.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition, which calls for similar action:

Call a General Election
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/700143
